ygData.subject: Re: Rarity of lambent stones
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Speaking of which, does anyone know what mobs are linked with griffennes?  I d like nothing better than to speed up their spawn rates by clearing some
ygData.messageBody:
kim@... wrote:

> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 18 Oct 1999, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
> >
> > With my own two hands, I have pulled stones from:
> >
> > GrimFeather in North Karana (level 37 griffon)
>
> Heh. I was getting tired of Chain/Screeching griffennes to
> get a charm (0 for 3 so far), and when I saw GrimFeather fly
> by I briefly considered charming him to kill the fenne for
> me.

Speaking of which, does anyone know what mobs are linked with griffennes? I'd like nothing
better than to speed up their spawn rates by clearing some trash but don't know exactly who or
what to kill. Beetles? Griffawns? Griffennes are annoyingly rare in such a large zone.

Jyzan
